eligibilityDetails.alreadyScheduled: This boxer is already scheduled for fights, which may affect their eligibility.
eligibilityDetails.notScheduled: This boxer is not scheduled for any fights.
eligibilityDetails.ageTooHigh: Age difference is too high. Boxer must be within 2 years of the opponent's age.
eligibilityDetails.ageMeetsRequirements: This boxer meets the age requirements, being within 2 years of the opponent's age.
eligibilityDetails.recordTooHigh: Fight record difference is too high. Boxer must have fewer than 3 fights difference with the opponent.
eligibilityDetails.recordMeetsRequirements: This boxer meets the record requirements.
eligibilityDetails.weightTooHigh: Weight difference is too high. Boxer must be within 3 kg of the opponent's weight.
eligibilityDetails.weightMeetsRequirements: This boxer meets the weight requirements, being within 3 kg of the opponent's weight.
